title: NO FEE! Super Spacious One Bed in Fantastic Brighton Location!
posting_body: One bed with a spacious floorplan just steps from the green line and everything else Brighton has to offer!
The bedroom and living room are HUGE!
The bedroom features two spacious closets.
The building features card-op laundry and an elevator (but this unit is on the first floor).
Move-in costs are super low - no broker fee, no security deposit.
Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!
